channel.title: Projects on Nathaniel Pyle
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Nathaniel Pyle

item.title: Car Incidents in New Zealand Between 2000-2025 from NZTA Dashboard
item.description: Using the Crash Analysis System (CAS) data, from the Waka Kotahi | NZ Transport Agency (NZTA) website, traffic accidents reported by the police on New Zealand key holiday periods were visualised using Tableau Public.

item.title: Titanic Survival Project
item.description: This project explores Titanic survival patterns using EDA and visualisations, focusing on age, class, fare, and sex.

item.title: Palmer Penguin Dataset
item.description: This project involved Exploratory Data Analysis and visualisation of the Palmer Penguins dataset using Python libraries including Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.

item.title: Breast Cancer Wisconsin Diagnostic Dataset
item.description: Using Exploratory Data Analysis and machine learning models, this project analysed the Breast Cancer Wisconsin (Diagnostic) dataset to identify the variables most strongly associated with diagnosis.

item.title: Top Ten Earthquakes of 2024 and Nuclear Power Stations
item.description: Through the use of QGIS, the ten largest earthquakes from 2024 were analysed and compared geospatially against Nuclear Power Stations around the world.
